response.message: So what's there to put under "Projects and links" in background now? Wasn't that the place for apps & software?
It might be useful to be able to put a limited amount of screenshots into the apps & software area - that way if we can get permission, we can build a "portfolio" of our work at a company.
@configurator, we are deprecating the Projects & Links field. New users (and those who never filled it in) will no longer see it.
